mfp:adapter.name: mfpApiTwilioSqlSpringSample
mfp:adapter.description: An API that relate users and phone numbers by registering users and validating their phone numbers using SMS and validation codes.

property.name: sid
property.displayName: The Twilio API SID to be used
property.description: Enter the Twilio API SID to be used (obtained from the Twilio console)

property.name: token
property.displayName: The Twilio API Token to be used
property.description: Enter the Twilio API token to be used (obtained from the Twilio console)

property.name: fromNumber
property.displayName: Number used to send SMS notifications
property.description: Enter the Twilio 'from' Phone number to be used (obtained from the Twilio console)

property.name: databaseLocation
property.displayName: JNDI location for the registration database
property.description: Enter the JNDI URL to the DataSource that was configured in the application server
